data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
One should always be facing forward. One takes 9 steps left. One takes 10 steps forward. One takes 9 steps right. One takes 10 steps backward. So, the answer is yes.

7 steps are multiples of the number of 1 step. 5 steps is multiples of the same number of steps. To go back one step you need to take 1 step. So, the answer is Yes.
